speaker: The Broken Mug
lines: You step into the Broken Mug and feel the hearth heat.
A cracked sign outside still hangs from one chain.
Dice sit in a bowl on a table near the door.
An antler hangs over the bar; the other is a tap handle.
Scars mark the floor from old fights.
A bard tunes a lute by the hearth.
The keeper polishes a glass and nods at you.

choices.text: Find a seat in the common room.
Lean on the bar and order something that burns.
Read the rumor leafs pinned to the post.
